Package com.jpaulmorrison.fbp.core.components.audio

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GenSamples
    Component to generate arrays of sound samples from note frequencies and times.
    JingleBells
    Generate note/duration pairs for Jingle Bells - 1st voice
    JingleBells2
    Generate note/duration pairs for Jingle Bells - 2nd voice
    MixerInput
    Miscellaneous Audio Mixer Input
    SoundMixer
    Component to play sequence of 1-second sound buffers - this component is the "front-end" of PlayTune
    Text2IntArray
    Convert comma-separated text to an array of ints - used in the TestTune network
